name: SURVIVOR (itch) (Siddharth_Garg, singh_praball, arca_ane, AtharvaDeshmukh)
description:
Story:

“Once Upon a time, tensed with back to back quizzes , An IITian went on a journey in the search of nirvana, but you know about life, he got stuck on a bizarre island instead. He is starving but the only option he has is to hunt for the fruits (he’s Vegan dunno why). He shoots the fruits carried by the birds but since he’s in a jungle , he’s got only 2 min before the wild animals wake up from the noise and come to hunt him. Either Starve to death or shoot for your life and maybe attain nirvana.”

Characters:

  1. Lynch (Our Adventurous IITian)
  2. Birds 

Let's see how long do you survive on this adventurous island!!

Controls: 

Aim movement: Mouse

Target shot: Left click

 

Made as a part of a project under GameDev, IITK

Developers - Team GlitchCamp:

 Rahul Jha
